html:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - Phoenix PHNX.L:

  • ABRDN RECONFIRMED COMMITMENT TO REMAINING 10.4% SHAREHOLDING IN PHOENIX

  • FOLLOWING SETTLEMENT OF TRANSACTION, ABRDN'S HOLDING IN PHOENIX WILL BE APPROXIMATELY 10.4% OF PHOENIX'S TOTAL ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL

  • GROUP HOLDINGS PLC NOTES THAT ABRDN PLC ("ABRDN") HAS TODAY ANNOUNCED SUCCESSFUL SALE OF APPROXIMATELY 40 MILLION SHARES IN PHOENIX

  • PHOENIX - ABRDN CONTINUES TO BE PHOENIX'S CORE STRATEGIC ASSET MANAGEMENT PARTNER AND MANAGES C.£165 BILLION OF GROUP'S ASSETS UNDER ADMINISTRATION.

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: PHNX.L
